text: Avianca is the national and largest airline of Colombia. It is the second oldest airline in the world. It began flying in 1919. Avianca has grown to become one of the largest airlines in the Americas. It flies to 121 cities with over 140 airplanes. In 2009, TACA Airlines and Avianca were combined to create a single airline. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Airlines of South America Category:Star Alliance Category:1919 establishments Category:1910s establishments in Colombia Category:IATA members Category:Companies of Colombia
title: Avianca
